name: Shimmy up the Chimney
description:
Made during GMTK 2021

you are slowly sliding down a chimney. hit same key as your partner to climb up.

if you're too slow the rising flames will catch up with you.

Controls:

mouse, keyboard or controller to hit the right key.

Credits:

art - Galit Weisberg

code - Ido Adler

sound - Cristian Rocco

font - luckiest guy
